Support
=======

Community Edition
-----------------

The community edition is a free and open-core version of omega-ml. It is designed for
individuals and small teams who want to use omega-ml for their projects. The community
edition includes all the core features of omega-ml, including the ability to create and
manage data products, run experiments, and deploy models.

Contributions are welcome at https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml

Documentation https://omegaml.github.io/omegaml/


Commercial Edition and Support
------------------------------

omega-ml Commercial Edition provides security on every level and is ready made
for Kubernetes deployment. It is licensed separately for deployment on on-premise,
private or hybrid cloud. Get in touch at https://omegaml.io
